content: I believe that it is possible to view the vedic texts through a modern lens without completely losing their original meaning. however, it is essential to approach the texts with an awareness of the historical and cultural context in which they were written. while modern perspectives can bring new insights and interpretations of the texts, it is also important to recognize and respect the traditional practices and beliefs that have been established over centuries. successfully blending our contemporary lens with the traditional context of the vedic texts is a challenging task that requires a delicate balance, but it is an opportunity for people to gain new insights and understandings.
